messages.subject: Courtship of Lady Tokio Doujinshi
messages.msgSnippet: This may have been post already, but Eeni is making a doujinshi from Misaki Toyodome s epic Saitoh Hajime/Takagi Tokio story, The Courtship of Lady Tokio. Four
messages.messageBody:
This may have been post already, but Eeni is making a doujinshi from Misaki Toyodome's epic Saitoh Hajime/Takagi Tokio story, The Courtship of Lady Tokio. Four chapters are finished and posted on pixiv.

I hope I'm posting the links correctly.

Chapter 1
